title: ISic003659. I.Sicily inscription 003659
body:
1XVII K(alendas) Septemb(res)
2Feridius Cereris dominae [s(ervus)]
3hic sibi suabiter fec(it) e[o-]
4rum tres adulescentes
5quorum nomina lege
6Onesimus et L(ucius) Valerius
7Casianus et Filumenus
8unus cum mulierae ea
9Taurus multis annis habe facian(t)
10coiuximus
11propitiam

l.3 reg., orig. suabiter | l.7 reg., orig. CASIANUSCasianus | l.8 reg., orig. mulierae | l.9 reg., orig. habe | l.10 reg., orig. coiuximus

1XVIIKSEPTEMB
2FERIDIUSCERERISDOMINAE[..]
3HICSIBISUABITERFECE[.]
4RUMTRESADULESCENTES
5QUORUMNOMINALEGE
6ONESIMUSETLVALERIUS
7CASIANUSETFILUMENUS
8UNUSCUMMULIERAEEA
9TAURUSMULTISANNISHABEFACIAN
10COIUXIMUS
11PROPITIAM

l.3 reg., orig. suabiter | l.7 reg., orig. CASIANUSCasianus | l.8 reg., orig. mulierae | l.9 reg., orig. habe | l.10 reg., orig. coiuximus

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Orsi 1918

Italian translation

Maria Barbieri

Il 16 Agosto Feridius servo della dea Cerere si unì carnalmente con tre adolescenti dei quali i nomi erano per legge Onesimus, L. Valerius Cassianus e Filumenus. Il solo Taurus (giacque) con quella donna, augurio ----.

commentary

A substantial text incised in the wall of room of a Roman house (late Republican / early Empire according to Orsi), but in a phase of dereliction after the original use of the house in Orsi's view. The text is incised within an outline of a tabula ansata. In large letters below the main text is the word PROPITIAM. Several other graffiti are recorded in the same room.

bibliography

  • 1919.0057 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • Orsi NSA 1918 58-60 fig.7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
